sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
At a General Court held at Boston; May 24th. 1682. This Court taking into consideration the frequent exportation of our New-England coyns out of the country ... it is ordered that all pieces of eight ... shall pass amongst us as currant money ... Massachusetts Bay Company. Rawson, Edward, 1615-1693.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
Printed by Samuel Green, [Cambridge, Mass. : 1682]
Signed: By the Court, Edward Rawson secr. Imprint suggested by Wing. Colonial seal at head of title. Reproduction of original in the Boston Public Library.
=======
At a General Court held at Boston; May 24th. 1682. This Court taking into consideration the frequent exportation of our New-England coyns out of the country ... it is ordered that all pieces of eight ... shall pass amongst us as currant money ... 1 sheet ([1] p.)
Printed by Samuel Green, [Cambridge, Mass. : 1682]
Signed: By the Court, Edward Rawson secr. Imprint suggested by Wing. Colonial seal at head of title. Reproduction of original in the Boston Public Library.
